name: suction-cups
short_effect: Prevents being forced out of battle by other Pokémon's moves.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot to negate all moves and items that force switching out.
